body: Tried cooking my first ever #soufflé, and it actually rose! What do you think? #baking #cookingadventures

comments.body: That looks incredible! Soufflés are so tricky! How was the texture?
@23232 Thanks! It was light and fluffy on the inside—way better than I expected for a first try!
Looks perfect! What kind of soufflé did you make? Chocolate, cheese?
@34343 Chocolate! Figured I'd start with dessert since it's a crowd favorite.
I’m impressed! Did it really rise that much, or did you have any close calls?
@45454 Haha, there were a few moments where I thought it might collapse, but it held up!
I’ve been too scared to try making a soufflé. Any tips for avoiding the dreaded collapse?
@56565 Definitely keep the oven door closed and resist the urge to peek! That, and whisking the egg whites until they're just right.
Looks so good! Did you eat it right away? I’ve heard soufflés don’t last long once they’re out of the oven.
@67676 Oh yeah, had to dive in immediately! You’re right—they deflate pretty fast, but still tasted amazing.
